title: Yuri in Which the World Will End in Ten Days - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy   Yuri
tags: Death   Death of Loved Ones   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Limited Lifespan   Modern Day   Short Story   Terminal Illness   Younger Love Interests
author: Aida   あいだ
description:
A story in which a woman, after learning that the world would end in ten days, sets out to finish one last thing: murder her ex-girlfriend.

However, she ends up befriending, and spending the world’s final days with, the little sister of her ex-girlfriend instead.>
